settings.title: Douglas Pereira Skin Science
settings.subtitle: (All skin type, uncomplicated skincare collection)
settings.text:
Twelve years after founding our premium skincare range Douglas Pereira Skin Health we have launched our new range Douglas Pereira Skin Science. This collection of products came from a need Douglas saw in the market, where some skincare consumers don’t want to have a complicated skincare routine, but still wanted to get most out of a few steps.

The range is a straightforward collection of products that has been developed for all genders and skin types. Our universal formulations offer all in one skincare solutions for those not wanting a complicated homecare regime, but still striving for result driven skincare without too many steps.

settings.title: An uncomplicated approach
settings.subtitle: The range has been divided into three collections making it easy for you to navigate and select your products. Core, Supportive and Enhancement collections.

settings.title: Core collection
settings.text:
The core product collection is your everyday routine and has been formulated to suite all skin types, eliminating the challenge of choosing the right products for your skin. The system is straightforward and has minimal steps, so you don’t have to invest too much time looking after your skin but can have the confidence all bases are covered with just a few steps.

Products

Universal cleanser
Universal moisturiser
Multi active day Serum
Recovery night serum
SPF protect 50+

settings.title: Supportive collection
settings.text:
Three exfoliating serums called Skin Drops. These serums have been formulated to support your everyday core skin routine. They melt and digest away dead skin cells, tighten pores and smooth your skin texture. There are three different formulations to target your skin concerns.

Products

Nutrient skin drops
Glow skin drops
Balancing skin drops

settings.title: Enhancement collection
settings.text:
Enhance your skin routine by giving yourself a little pamper with one of our skin condition masks “see our at home facial guide below”

Products

Nutrient skin mask
Glow skin mask
Balancing skin mask
No water cleanser

settings.title: The Science | Universal formulations
settings.subtitle: The routine may be uncomplicated but the formulars are complex. Just like our premium range, we use science as our foundation and formulate with the best of the best ingredients at the right dose for your skin. But with the Douglas Pereira Skin Science range we have formulated only a few products and jam packed them with all the vital vitamins, nutrients and minerals your skin needs.

settings.title: Your uncomplicated routine steps:
settings.subtitle: Keeping things simple
settings.text:
Morning routine – Four uncomplicated steps
Step 1: Universal cleanser
Step 2: Multi active day Serum
Step 3: Universal moisturiser
Step 4: SPF protect 50+

Evening routine – Three uncomplicated steps
Step 1: Universal cleanser
Step 2: Recovery night serum
Step 3: Universal moisturiser

If you want to step up your routine and make it little more targeted for your skin needs, you can include one of the Skin Drops exfoliating serums. Apply this serum either in the morning or evening as the first serum you apply.

settings.title: A few side notes and tips
settings.text:
Tip 1. If you like a heaver richer moisturiser the Hydra sleep nutrient mask doubles as a great moisturiser for the morning and evening for a dryer, dehydrated or mature skin.

Tip 2. If you use makeup during the day, we recommend doing a pre cleanse in the evening with our No Water Cleanser. This will remove all traces of makeup before you cleanse your skin.

Tip 3. When you want to have an at home facial treatment, we have you covered with our collection of masks.
At home facial steps:
Step 1: Cleanse your face
Step 2: Apply your chosen exfoliating Skin drops to your face and neck and leave to activate for 5min. “don’t remove”
Step 3: Apply your chosen mask to your face and neck follow the individual mask instruction then lay back and relax.
Step 4: If your mask requires removal, rinse off with warm water and a face cloth then apply your serum and moisturiser to complete your facial.
